alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:02PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wood, western Portage and southwestern Marathon Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 201 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Owen to near Neillsville to near Black River Falls. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Dorchester around 215 PM CDT. Abbotsford around 220 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Pittsville, Babcock, Wisconsin Rapids, Lake Wazeecha, Mosinee and Whiting. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
